meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6317.

td.p: Pian Wong, a high school English teacher from New York, New York
Justin Hofstetter, a sixth and seventh grade language arts and social studies teacher from Kansas City, Missouri
Leslie Decker, a high school German and ESL teacher from Austin, Texas

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
LeslieWhat are Pakistan & Afghanistan?
$6,399
PianWhat is the [illegible]
$10,112
JustinWhat are India and Pakistan?
$1,711
Pakistan & Afghanistan')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
